reviews.review:
Great game overall, takes a while to learn the in's and out's. 

Good game to play with friends.

This game is a very good game for it's price and doesn't get the attention that it deserves. When you start off the game you will struggle a lot because there's a large learning curve that forces you to explore all the elements of this game. When you finally learn the basics the game will get easier and will seem more balanced in your favor. Overall it's well worth it's price. Also the extra stuff that you have to buy with it's in game currency is really expensive.

dopo quasi 2000 ore posso dire che il gioco ha un'idea innovativa e fantastica, peccato a volte per la community tossica che non sanno come convogliare la rabbia della loro inutile vita e giocano killer camperando e tunnellando, ma a parte questo Ã¨ un garn bel gioco. ora penserei di sistemare i bug e migliorare il gioco.

Great game to play with friends as Survivor.
If playing alone, might as well play as Killer.

best repair technician simulator on the market hands down^^

jokes asides dbd spirals into a game where your encouraged to bully, exploit and tilt whoever's not on your side, regardless of whether your the killer or not [heck, id lean that survivors are much worse in higher ranks of play] 

occasionally scrapes the bottom of the matchmaking barrel, problems with getting a full match, or people just leaving early-mid game [bonus points if they try to duke/tunnel/teabag you and failed]
on the opposite end you have people who WILL out class you with perks, better execute the games mechanical throws, or even just have dam tight communication, and will use all of this to make you question why you even load this game, but!
if your able to get past its admittedly annoying idiosyncrasies, earn around some rather bs mechanics and revel in just being a massive ass you'll find a lot of fun to be had here and quite a few chill peeps to have that with

just be wary of a proportion, you get this dbd etiquette in the popular circle, its played off as 'boundaries you should'nt cross' and 'your proving to be a crap player if you do so', something id back if it was a niche more social community like a street fighter tournament, yet these boundaries I've found are non specific, vastly generalised, inconsistent as hell and more often than not just plain detrimental forms of play, almost like everyone's got their own home brew rule set to play to play and feels like back at high school, being scolded by the worlds angriest hall monitors
so here's a tiny guide for fresh meat to ensure you are never embarrassed in such 'awful' ways

'camper' = ALL survivors are trying to save the one you hooked, yet they expect you to look else where for them
'tunneler' = a killer finally catches the one that has been antagonising them all game
'looper' = youve been looping a killer all around the map and yet they still wont break off and deal with other survivors
'gen rusher' = a killer that has yet unlocked the ability to see generators, exploit accordingly
'butt dancing' = the dance of our people
'[insert insults]' = im smol, holds me OWO
Very nice game , fix window on Iron works misery
such a good game but need fix hex runes,its hard to win if too much hex runes

Es un juego absolutamente divertido,hay que entender jugar,tiene buenos graficos y es muy entretenido pero yo creo que estaria mas bien si pusieran eventos tipo minijuegos y cosas asi por tiempo limitado pero por lo general esta guapisimo.Lo recomiendo a todos/todas.

Update: Game has gotten even worse.  I have now entirely stopped playing it.  Introduction of MMR made every survivor game super easy and killer games super hard.  Further they keep nerfing any killer who has a remote chance of winning and refuse to address the real issue (gen speed).

Original review:  Game developers are not responsive to issues in the game.  They refuse to balance the game for high end players.  Explicitly stating they won't balance the game for teams on voice chat (which is the equivalent of having 7 extra perks for free).  Further community is extremely toxic with every game you win resulting in a post game pissing match.  Further the devs do nothing to resolve this issue and in fact will punish the wrong parties (just look in their forums).
its a good game would love for others to play it only issue is maybe a little hard
Really fun game, hitboxes has been fixed a bit but their still fked up. Other than that this is the best Horrorgame ive played in awhile

Un joc de supravietuire foarte distractiv care este fain atat solo cat si cu prietenii. Recomand sa-l luati cu tot cu dlc-uri, altfel aveti mult de jucat pentru a debloca un nou caracter si din cand in cand mai sunt adaugate caractere noi care nu fac parte din dlc-urile jocului. Cu alte cuvinte nu deblocati careacterele care fac parte in dlc-uri cu punctele obtinute in joc daca planuit mai tarziu sa cumparati dlc-ul. Punctele nu sunt rambursate.
This game is fun to play with friends. once you play this game and you catch on to it, you will probably play this for lots of hours.

De cara parece meio monÃ³tono, por sÃ³ existir um modo de jogo, mas o jogo possui um leque enorme de personagens para se jogar e cada um com suas respectivas vantagens Ãºnicas, o que possibilita ter jogabilidades diferentes e o que torna cada partida diferente da outra.

Honestly I wasn't sure if I'd like this game and I got pretty man-handled my first few games, but really this game is a blast when you start to get the hang of it. Playing solo is alright, but not nearly as much fun.

Buen juego! ----> esto fue cuando llevaba 148 horas, ahora que estoy casi en las 540 horas puedo decir que me sigue gustando pero todavia le falta, ya que tras jugar 4 partidas y que venga un asesino todo lageado de vez en cuando o que te toquen compaÃ±eros que no entienden nada y solo te miran como mueres o no reparan, el gameplay se hace bastante desagradable, la manera de solucionarlo es jugar en party el cual, para el asesino es una gran desventaja.

Pero si me preguntan es putamente adictivo, y sigo dandole como caja casi todos los dias. 

PD: Mejoren las recompensas de los eventos que valen mierda ahhhhhhhh.
Cuando entenderan que no queremos colgantes hijos de puta, queremos skins.
Killers campers e tunneleiros junto com companheiros de equipe sequelados que nunca sabem jogar. 10/10
